title: Professions 2
sentences: y hace experimentos en el laboratorio.
My sister is a scientist and does experiments in the laboratory.
Do you know the electrician who fixes the lights?
es muy alta y camina muy bien.
That model is very tall and walks very well.
vive en el campo con sus vacas.
The farmer lives in the countryside with his cows.
Her mother is a judge and works in the court.
porque la cocina tiene mucha agua.
I call the plumber because the kitchen has a lot of water.
What does the saleswoman sell in the shopping mall?
usa muchos colores en sus cuadros.
The painter uses many colors in his paintings.
She is studying to be a biologist and save the forest.
My grandfather was a carpenter and made wooden tables.
Are you a new employee in this factory?
The taxi driver takes us quickly to the airport.
We listen to a singer with an incredible voice.
The bricklayer is building a modern building.
nos ayuda con las maletas en el avión.
The flight attendant helps us with the bags on the plane.
That designer makes very original clothes.
I go to see the psychologist every Monday.
me recomienda un libro de historia.
The librarian recommends a history book to me.
My aunt works as a translator in a language company.
Is your uncle still a sailor on that ship?
nos cuenta la historia del museo.
The guide tells us the history of the museum.
My brother wants to be a soldier to serve the country.
dice que la empresa gana dinero.
The economist says the company is making money.
The archaeologist found very ancient objects.
The cleaner finishes his work very late.
dictionary:
El científico / La científica - The scientist
El electricista / La electricista - The electrician
El granjero / La granjera - The farmer
El juez / La jueza - The judge
El fontanero / La fontanera - The plumber
El carpintero / La carpintera - The carpenter
El albañil - The bricklayer
El azafato / La azafata - The flight attendant
El guía / La guía - The guide
El traductor / La traductora - The translator
